bibl.title: Petitioner v. Defendant. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Indicment Pettel Laurens A June Bell
Witnesses S. B. Fargo C. L. Bridges Leut Apperson
Territory of Washington } District Court Walla Walla County } First Judicial District
Territory of Washington Deft. vs James Sheridan Deft.

At a regular time of the District Court of the First Judicial District begun and held at Walla Wall concernly Territory of Washington repane the 27th day of April A. D. the grand juries good and lawful man duly cliched improneled and sworn charged to require in and for the county aforesaid on their so the present that James Sheridanlate of Walla Walla county Territory of Washington of said County upon the Tenth day if April A. D. 1863 one another pistol of the value of fifteen dollars and of the personal goods and property of a soldier name unknown other person aforesaid allemantely did did steel toke and carry away something to the from and force of the statute in such saw made and provided and the peace and dignity of the Territory of Washington W. E. Langford Pros. Atty.
